name: leaflet-schematic
description: Leaflet SVG viewer for non-cartographic high-detailed schematics

scripts.start: watchify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s L.Schematic demo/js/index.js -o demo/js/build.js & serve -p 3003
scripts.build-js: browserify -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s L.Schematic -u leaflet ./index.js -o dist/L.Schematic.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build-js && npm run compress

author: Alexander Milevski <info@w8r.name>
